titleStmt.title: An antidote against sorrovv, in order to the obtaining of sanctified joy. An excellent treatise first written in French by N. Vedelius, then translated into Latine by Gallus Pareus, and now into English, by Cadwallader Winne, M.A.
titleStmt.author: Vedel, Nicolaus, 1596-1642.
Winne, Cadwallader, b. 1622 or 3, translator.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for George Lathum [i.e. Latham], and are to be sold at his shop at the sign of the Bishops head in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
